display_long_description:
**Get Last Stand now for a special introductory early access price—available for a limited time only!**

This is the world’s first multi-location mixed reality PvP shootout. Your living room becomes a battlefield as you eliminate your opponent while fending off a relentless zombie invasion. Move, dodge, and take cover in a fully immersive combat zone.

[media]

**1v1 Mixed Reality PvP Combat**

Battle opponents from anywhere—each player fights from their own home. Turn your living room into a battlefield, outsmarting rivals with real-world strategy.

[media]

**Precision Full-Body Tracking**

Dodge bullets like in The Matrix or land headshots like John Wick! Our full-body tracking ensures every movement feels accurate and responsive, immersing you deeply in the action.

[media]

**Your Room, Your Advantage**

Transform your living room from a Netflix haven into a tactical stronghold. Your couch becomes a fortress; your table, a shield. Outsmart and outmaneuver—your home is part of the fight!

[media]

**Cinematic Shootouts at Home**

Experience intense gunfights and explosive combat, with dynamic destruction shaping every encounter. With dynamic destruction, every round is as intense as a blockbuster.

[media]

**Play Solo**

Take on the Horde Solo in our brand new single player experience.

**Last Stand is an early access title pushing the boundaries of mixed reality. Join our community on Discord to share feedback and help us shape the future of the game.**

Visit **LastStandXR.com** to learn more and join the discord.
